    YMT DEVELOPMENT RESOURCES Vacancies INTERNSHIP FOR FINANCIAL ADVISOR

    November 3, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    YMT DEVELOPMENT RESOURCES is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for INTERNSHIP FOR FINANCIAL ADVISOR position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    What you'll need to succeed

    You must:

    • Nationality : Malaysian
    • Education : Candidates must possess at least Diploma or its equivalent
    • Be a team player with integrity
    • Embrace performance driven sales culture
    • Have excellent communication and interpersonal skills
    • Be streetwise, with good selling and negotiation skills
    • Preferably possess own transport
    • Good at interpersonal communication and learning.
    • Outgoing, confident and optimistic, articulate, infectious, enthusiastic about sales work.
    • Strong learning ability and excellent communication skills, willing to learn financial knowledge.
    • Tough personality, quick thinking, good strain capacity and pressure capacity.
    • Have keen market insight, strong sense of responsibility and positive working attitude.
    • Strong command of English and Bahasa Malaysia (written and spoken)-(Necessary), (Optional)
    • Have significant involvement in extra-curricular activities
    • Positive thinking, jovious , self initiative and self-discipline.
    • No experience is needed but candidates with sales,marketing and finance knowledge would be an advantage
    • Love meeting with new people and learning new things.
    • A quick thinker and generous.
    • Discipline and Good Attitude
    • Willing to work in Johor Bahru (* see the benefits)

    Your new role

    Includes these responsibilities :

    • To promote and professionally sell selected range of Bancassurance products to achieve sales target.
    • To provide bank’s existing and potential customers professional advice on appropriate financial products based on customer's need
    • To ensure customer satisfaction and provide excellent after sales service
    • To plan and to implement sales activities related to Bancassurance products
    • Provide financial advisory to clients across various areas of needs (Eg: Accumulation, Protection, Investment, Endowments , Morgage, Estate Planning,Etc)
    • Provide professional consultation and servicing to clients
    • Market and develop business across various channels and networks
    • Develop and build long term business relationships with key stakeholders
    • Others terms and conditions required by company

    What you'll get in return

    • Learn and practice basic day to day work or projects in a shared services environment
    • Engage in networking with colleagues from other business functions and Senior Management on best work practices
    • Discover within own team and/or with other process teams to identify and implement improvement opportunities
    • Delivering high levels of customer service to both internal or external stakeholders
    • Performing other relevant support activities as and when required
    • Competitive uncapped earning potential
    • Structured career progression
    • Good support and on-the-job training
    • No match

    Reference Link:

    Job Categories: Finance | Banking | Insurance | Marketing | Investment | Estate Planning

    Job Types: Internship / Industrial Training.

    Job Tags: finance, financial, internship, marketing, planner, sales, insurance, mortgage and wealth.

    Salary: Disclosed upon application.

    For any enquiries, please call us using the following telephone number or directly email to us.

    Company Overview

    Your new company 
    This opportunity is with a leading international financial services organisation providing insurance, wealth and asset management solutions to individual and corporate clients.
    To continue learning ensure for future success of life
    We are largest group in malaysia which consist of 30 branches in malaysia. Systematic training system and environment which provide world class support to our customer and young talent to success in financial industry
    Reference Link:
    Job Categories: Finance | Banking | Insurance | Trading (k).
    Job Types: Internship / Industrial Training.
    Job Tags: finance, financial, internship, marketing, planner, sales, insurance, mortgage and wealth.
    Salary: Disclosed upon application.

    For any enquiries, please call us using the following telephone number or directly email to us.
    Connie Tan
    Recruitment Executive 
    YMT DEVELOPMENT RESOURCES
    • T: (607)361 1349

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
